text: Edward Brumley (7 May 1878 – 3 February 1942) was an English footballer who played as a centre-half. ==References== Category:1878 births Category:1942 deaths Category:People from Grimsby Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Humber Rovers F.C. players Category:Grimsby All Saints F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Reading F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Edward Brumley
